badge.name: Computer Science

criteria.narrative: In recognition of fulfillment of the prescribed course of study authorized by the Board of Regents for Higher Education, and upon the recommendation of the faculty, we hereby confer upon

badge.description: with all the honors, rights, and privileges appertaining thereunto. In Witness thereof, the undersigned have affixed and subscribed their names on this the sixteenth day of December, two thousand sixteen.

signatureLines.name: Your signature
signatureLines.subTitle: Board of Regents for Higher Education
